DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Tacrolimus mycophenolate mofetil may effective treatment graft-versus-host disease cause donor stem cell transplantation . PURPOSE : This phase II trial study well give tacrolimus together mycophenolate mofetil work prevent acute graft-versus-host disease patient undergo donor stem cell transplantation advance hematologic cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Tacrolimus Mycophenolate Mofetil Preventing Acute Graft-Versus-Host Disease Patients With Advanced Hematologic Cancer Who Are Undergoing Donor Stem Cell Transplantation
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - Determine efficacy tacrolimus mycophenolate mofetil prevent acute graft-vs-host disease patient advance hematologic malignancy undergo allogeneic peripheral blood stem cell transplantation . Secondary - Determine safety regimen patient . OUTLINE : This non-randomized study . Patients receive tacrolimus IV continuously orally twice daily day -1 60 followed taper day 180 . Patients also receive mycophenolate mofetil IV 2 hour orally twice daily day 0-60 followed taper day 180 . Treatment discontinued day 180 absence graft-vs-host disease . Patients follow survival . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 5-25 patient accrue study .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Diagnosis 1 follow hematologic malignancy : Acute myeloid leukemia beyond first complete remission ( CR1 ) Acute lymphoblastic leukemia beyond CR1 Chronic myelogenous leukemia second chronic phase , accelerated phase , blastic phase NonHodgkin 's lymphoma beyond CR2 Hodgkin 's lymphoma beyond CR2 Multiple myeloma ( stage ) Myelodysplastic syndromes beyond refractory anemia ( include chronic myelomonocytic leukemia ) Any refractory hematologic malignancy Advanced disease Scheduled transplantation mobilize allogeneic peripheral blood stem cell Genotypically HLAidentical stem cell donor available PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Age 65 Performance status Not specify Life expectancy Not specify Hematopoietic Not specify Hepatic Bilirubin ≤ 1.5 time upper limit normal ( ULN ) SGOT SGPT ≤ 2.0 time ULN Renal Creatinine clearance ≥ 60 mL/min Pulmonary No acute pulmonary infection chest xray No severe hypoxemia ( partial O_2 < 70 % predict ) AND DLCO < 70 % predict No mild hypoxemia ( partial O_2 < 80 % predict ) AND DLCO < 60 % predict Other Not pregnant nursing Negative pregnancy test No active systemic infection control antimicrobial therapy HIV negative ( HIV1 virus ) PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Biologic therapy No concurrent Tcell deplete hematopoietic stem cell graft Chemotherapy Not specify Endocrine therapy Not specify Radiotherapy Not specify Surgery Not specify
